price: 78 Béni soit le nom de ton Seigneur, Dieu de majesté et de générosité.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
